page.title: 19TRANSPORT IN HOLBERROW GREEN
page.content:
There are 3 main roads that cut through the area and provide the main routes for communcation. A422 which runs from Worcester to Stratford upon Avon. B4092 which connects Holberrow Green to Astwood Bank and thus Redditch. B4090 which is the main Droitwich to Alcester road. Most people use privately owned motor cars. Some have bicycles. Car ownership is fairly essential in this area as public transport is very limited.
There are two Midland Red buses to Redditch and one from Redditch per day through Holberrow Green on B 4092. A local coach company provides school bus runs twice a day, solely for school children. There is also a shopping bus service to neighbouring towns.
